page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content: {CHILDREN's FAVOURITE GAME} Most children liked Monopoly. Other games enjoyed were Connect 4, cards, I_Spy, Cluedo, snooker, Frustration and computer games. {PARENT'S HOBBIES Reading is the most popular hobby followed by sewing, sport and gardening.Other interests which occupy parents are home brewing, collecting cut_glass, camping, sailing, shooting, male voice choir and duck breeding. {CHILDREN'S HOBBIES Some of the most popular ones are football,BMX CYCLING(bicycle motor cross)others include reading, drawing, sport,cubs, astronomy,brownies, piano, photography,philately,sheep keeping, bee keeping and ornithology.
